author: remm
msg: - Add a WebDAV web application (and links to it) to showcase
- The WebDAV servlet is not migrated to this web application,
because of dependencies with a lot of stuff in Catalina, which are
not accessible from within a web application :
* it extends DefaultServlet to avoid a massive duplication of
* it uses, like DefaultServlet, the Resources interface to
abstract the source of the files being served, instead
I think both of these dependencies make a lot of sense, so I
suggest we keep the current packaging of the source.
